page.title: 05EFFECTS OF SEWAGE DISPOSAL
page.content: {For many years the powerful smells {from the sewage works have been a {matter of considerable social concern, {particularly during the summer months. {Two of our local schools;All Saints; {situated near the main treatment {plant, Old Earth,. near the Lowfields {sludge dump, and local residents have {complained about the nuisance. It is {only recently, perhaps due to concern {shown by Roy Galley M.P. for {Halifax that positive alternatives {have been suggested. {Pumping sludge to Huddersfield would {need a Â£3million pipeline. Yorkshire {Water recognise the urgency of a long {term solution and are preparing a {scheme for sewage treatment and {carrying out studies which should be {completed within a year. We shall {see! { }
